column3: You're jumping the gun here. Let the discussion on the mailing list come to rough consensus first.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/f4a78bebc45b44533ad55906a71bf0dbe4cf7b1e for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Closing, because it is easier for me to keep track of the request if it comes from my github user.\n
